title: Compare Supermarket Prices
description: Visit a nearby supermarket and take a photo of a product price. Compare it to online prices.

title: Evaluate Window Display
description: Go to the specified shop and rate how visually appealing the window display is.

title: Check Stock Availability
description: Go to a store and check if a specific product is available on shelves.

title: Take a Photo of Storefront
description: Take a picture of a specific storeâ€™s entrance and upload it.

title: Count Visitors
description: Observe and count how many people enter a store in 10 minutes.

title: Check Store Cleanliness
description: Evaluate the cleanliness of the store (floors, shelves, toilets).

title: Test Customer Service
description: Ask a product-related question and rate how helpful the staff was.

title: Measure Checkout Time
description: Buy a cheap item and time how long the full checkout takes.

title: Review In-Store Promotion
description: Take a photo of an in-store promotion and describe if it was clear and attractive.

title: Count Parking Availability
description: Count how many parking spaces are available at a store location.
